message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a fantastic opportunity for you, and I'm confident this price will be a win-win for both of us.  Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your counteroffer.  I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000. This price still allows me to get a good return on the product, while still being within your budget.  Let's make this deal happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $1,075,000. Can you consider this price?
